lmdp.grounding.GroundingClass module¶

Abstract class for grounding names to MDPs Author: Rafael Rodriguez-Sanchez (rrs@brown.edu) Date: August 2020

lmdp.grounding.PartialFunctionClass module¶

Partial Function Specification Class

  • Represents function specification, with a given domain-codomain,

in the form of a function by parts. - Implemented as Pairs of (boolean expressions, function).

author: Rafael Rodriguez-Sanchez (rrs@brown.edu) date: January 2021

class lmdp.grounding.PartialFunctionClass.PartialFunction(domain=[], codomain=[])¶
